programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: The Mad Fisherman make a return visit to Newfound Lake in central New Hampshire, gives a history lesson regarding the lake, and visits Twins Lounge to critique a couple of cocktails.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie invites actor/comedian Juston McKinney into his world. Juston talks about his comedy career and Charlie struggles with Juston's casting ability. Charlie takes Juston and the crew to a lakeside lunch at the Wolfetrap Restaurant.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: The show heads to Lake Pawtuckaway in southern New Hampshire. Charlie makes an impromptu stop at a farm stand to try the local goat's milk, while son Anthony heads to Pawtuckaway Trading Post and learns how to shoot a bow.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie heads north to Hanover, New Hampshire to fish the Connecticut River, with the goal of catching a largemouth bass, a smallmouth bass and a pickerel all in one day. He also offers his thoughts on Chubby Checker and the Twist.

programme.title: Charlie Moore: No Offense
programme.desc: Charlie heads down to beautiful Newport, Rhode Island and quickly realizes that no one knows the difference between a flounder and a fluke.
